body:
Hi Sara,

I wonder if you're confusing Python and GHPython. The version is for GHPython which is a Grasshopper plugin which you can download both from [food4Rhino](http://www.food4rhino.com/project/ghpython?ufh) and [github](https://github.com/mcneel/ghpython/releases). You should be fine to use the most recent version with no issues.

Mostapha
